name: Ousted (Reispfannenfresser, AlexSkogkatt, Starboi hooch)
description:
Your home planet is under attack from evil aliens and it's destruction is sadly inevitable.

Hold them off for as long as possible to help the feeble evacuation efforts.

Controls

  • WASD: Movement
  • Space: Shoot
  • TAB: Pause

Controllers are welcome:

  • Left Stick: Movement
  • A: Shoot
  • B: Pause

Credits

  • AleksSkogkatt: Graphics
  • Reispfannefresser: Code, Design
  • StarboiHooch: Dialogue, Sfx, Music, Additional Code, Design
